name: AGORAPHOBE
description: NEVER LEAVE YOUR ROOM
info: You win as long as you never leave your initial room.

name: AHAB
description: STAY AWAY FROM MOBY AND THE BOMBER
info: You win if Moby is in the same room as the Bomber at the end of the game and you are not.

name: ANARCHIST
description: USURP ROOM LEADER A MAJORITY OF ROUNDS
info: You win if your vote helped successfully usurp a leader during a majority of the rounds. For example, in a 3 round game, you must have usurped a leader 2 of the 3 rounds.

name: BOMB-BOT
description: BE WITH THE BOMBER, AVOID THE PRESIDENT
info: You win if you are in the same room as the Bomber but the President is not.

name: BUTLER
description: BE WITH THE MAID AND THE PRESIDENT
info: You win if you are in the same room as the Maid and the President at the end of the game.

name: CLONE
description: THE PLAYER THAT FIRST SHARES WITH YOU MUST WIN
info:
You win if the first player with whom you card share or color share wins. If you fail to share with any player by the end of the game, you lose.

Note: if the first person with whom you share is the Robot, and the Robot's first share was with youâ€¦
you both lose.

name: DECOY
description: GET SHOT BY THE SNIPER
info: You win if the Sniper shoots you at the end of the last round.

name: GAMBLER
description: GUESS IF RED, BLUE OR NEITHER TEAM WON
info:
At the end of the last round, before all players reveal their cards, you must publicly announce which team ( Red Team, Blue Team, or neither) you think won the game. Win only if you are correct.

Note: You have a pause game number of 10. Only pause the game and make your announcement after all characters with a lower pause game number (e.g. Private Eye) have finished their announcements.

name: HOT POTATO
description: YOU LOSE, BUT SHARING >> SWAPPING
info:
You have the HOT POTATO power: any player that card shares or color shares with you immediately trades cards with you. Both you and the other player assume the powers and the allegiance of the newly acquired cards. The Hot Potato loses at the end of the game.

Note: Due to the cleanse rule, any previously acquired conditions (e.g. "cursed") are lost when receiving a new character card.

name: INTERN
description: BE WITH THE PRESIDENT
info: You win if you are in the same room as the President at the end of the game.

name: JULIET
description: BE WITH ROMEO AND THE BOMBER
info: You win if you are in the same room as Romeo and the Bomber at the end of the game.

name: MAID
description: BE WITH THE BUTLER AND THE PRESIDENT
info: You win if you are in the same room as the Butler and the President at the end of the game.

name: MASTERMIND
description: BE THE LEADER OF BOTH ROOMS AND AT THE END
info: You win if you are a room's leader at the end AND you were the leader of the opposing room at some point during the game.

name: MI6
description: CARD SHARE WITH THE PRESIDENT AND THE BOMBER
info: You win if you card share with the Bomber and the President before the end of the game.

name: MINION
description: YOU LOSE IF YOUR LEADER IS USURPED
info: You win if a leader is never usurped in the same room as you.

name: MISTRESS
description: BE WITH THE PRESIDENT, AVOID THE WIFE
info: You win if you are in the same room as the President at the end of the game and the Wife is not.

name: MOBY
description: AVOID THE BOMBER AND AHAB
info: You win if Ahab is in the same room as the Bomber at the end of the game and you are not.

name: NUCLEAR TYRANT
description: "FOOLISH" +  DON'T CARD SHARE WITH THE PRIMARIES
info:
At the end of the game, you are asked if you shared your card with both the President and the Bomber.

You win if at least one of them did not card share with you by the end of the game. If you win, all other players lose. You begin with the "foolish" condition. Players with the "foolish" condition can never turn down an offer to card or color share.

Note: If a player with the "foolish" condition were to acquire a contradictory condition (e.g. "shy" or
"coy"), the 2 conditions would cancel one another, leaving the player with neither condition.

name: PRIVATE EYE
description: GUESS THE BURIED CARD
info:
At the end of the last round, before all players reveal their character cards, you must publicly announce the identity of the buried card. Win only if you are correct.

Note: You have a pause game number of 5. Only pause the game and make your announcement after all characters with a lower pause game number have finished their announcements.

name: QUEEN
description: AVOID THE PRESIDENT AND THE BOMBER
info: You win if you are NOT in the same room as the President or the Bomber at the end of the game.

name: RIVAL
description: AVOID THE PRESIDENT
info: You win if you are NOT in the same room as the President at the end of the game.

name: ROBOT
description: THE PLAYER YOU FIRST SHARE WITH MUST LOSE
info:
You win if the first player with whom you card share or color share fails to achieve all of their win objectives. If you fail to share with any players by the end of the game, then you lose.

Note: if the first person with whom you share is the Clone, and the Clone's first share was with youâ€¦
you both lose.

name: ROMEO
description: BE WITH JULIET AND THE BOMBER
info: You win if you are in the same room as Juliet and the same room as the Bomber at the end of the game.

name: SNIPER
description: SHOOT THE TARGET
info:
At the end of the last round, before all players reveal their character cards, you must publicly announce which player you are shooting. The selected player does not have to be in the same room as you. You win if the player you selected is the Target.

Note: You have a pause game number of 15. Only pause the game and make your announcement after all characters with a lower pause game number (e.g. Private Eye) have finished their announcements.

name: SURVIVOR
description: AVOID THE BOMBER
info: You win if you are NOT in the same room as the Bomber at the end of the game.

name: TARGET
description: DONT GET SHOT BY THE SNIPER
info: You win if the Sniper does not shoot you at the end of the last round.

name: TRAVELER
description: BE SENT AS A HOSTAGE A MAJORITY OF ROUNDS
info: You win if you are sent to a different room as a hostage at the end of MOST rounds. For example, in a 3 round game, you must change rooms twice to win.

name: VICTIM
description: BE WITH THE BOMBER
info: You win if you are in the same room as the Bomber at the end of the game.

name: WIFE
description: BE WITH THE PRESIDENT, AVOID THE MISTRESS
info: You win if you are in the same room as the President at the end of the game and the Mistress is not.

name: TELEPATH
description: GUESS THE LAST HOSTAGE >> WIN
info: You win if you correctly predict the player (not character) that will be the hostage coming into your room at the end of the last round. To formalize your prediction, you must publicly reveal your card during the last round of the game and verbally name (or adequately describe) your prediction. Note: your prediction can't be the hostage leaving your current room. You must predict the hostage that will be coming INTO your room.

name: HORSE
description: DONT LEAVE WITHOUT YOUR CARRIAGE
info: You win as soon as you leave a room as a hostage together with the carriage.

name: CARRIAGE
description: DONT LEAVE WITHOUT YOUR HORSE
info: You win as soon as you leave a room as a hostage together with the horse.

name: ROCK
description: BE WITH SCISSORS, AVOID PAPER
info: You win if you are in the same room as the Scissors, but not in the same room as the Paper

name: PAPER
description: BE WITH ROCK, AVOID SCISSORS
info: You win if you are in the same room as the Rock, but not in the same room as the Scissors

name: SCISSORS
description: BE WITH PAPER, AVOID ROCK
info: You win if you are in the same room as the Paper, but not in the same room as the Rock

name: GREY TRAITOR
description: YOU WANT THE GREYS TO LOSE
info:
You win if everyone on the grey Team loses.

Note: if you ever switch teams/alliances, your win objective changes to: "You win if your team loses". E.g. You become a member of Team Zombie, then you only win if Team Zombie loses.

name: VIKING
description: YOU WANT EVERYONE TO LOSE
info: You only win if everyone else loses. Good luck!

name: MASTER
description: CARD SHARE WITH THE APPRENTICE MOST ROUNDS
info: You win if you card share with the APPRENTICE in the majority of rounds. (e.g. When playing 4 rounds you both have to card share in at least 3 rounds.)

name: APPRENTICE
description: CARD SHARE WITH THE MASTER MOST ROUNDS
info: You win if you card share with the APPRENTICE in the majority of rounds. (e.g. When playing 4 rounds you both have to card share in at least 3 rounds.)

name: DICTATOR
description: BECOME A LEADER
info: If you become a leader during any round you will instantly win and everyone else loses.

name: CONSPIRATOR
description: BECOME A LEADER & EXPOSE THE PRIMARIES
info: During any round, when you become a leader, you must publicly reveal your card which forces everyone in your room to public reveal as well. You win if you have forced all primaries to publicly reveal their card at least once.

name: MASTERMIND 2.0
description: NAME ALL CARD COLORS AT THE END
info: You win if you can name all card colors at the end of the game. You have a pause game number of 9. Only pause the game and make your announcement after all characters with a lower pause game number (e.g. Private Eye) have finished their announcements.
